title: Our 21-year-old Isn't Being an Adult
description:
David is frustrated with his stepson who isn't respecting the house rules and with his wife who isn't willing to push her adult son out of the nest. - Dr. Laura: "Stepparents who try to parent stepchildren can cause a true rift."

How do you handle discipline of your stepchildren? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
